designs.title: Floral Elegance
designs.description: Delicate floral patterns with negative space for a modern, sophisticated look. This elegant design features flowing lines and minimalist motifs that create a contemporary aesthetic while maintaining traditional henna artistry. Ideal for festivals, casual events, and those who appreciate understated beauty. The design emphasizes clean lines and strategic use of space, making it perfect for modern celebrations.

designs.title: Intricate Traditional
designs.description: Rich traditional motifs including mandalas, paisleys, and fine lattice work create a timeless classic for special occasions. This design showcases the depth of traditional Indian mehndi artistry with intricate patterns that cover the hands and arms beautifully. Each element is carefully crafted to create a harmonious composition that honors cultural heritage while adding modern elegance.

designs.title: Bridal Masterpiece
designs.description: This intricate bridal mehndi features traditional Indian motifs including peacocks, lotus flowers, and paisley patterns extending from fingertips to elbows. Perfect for the modern bride who wants a blend of classic elegance and detailed artistry. The design incorporates personalized elements and symbolic patterns that tell your unique love story. Each motif is carefully placed to create a stunning visual narrative that will be remembered for years to come.

designs.title: Modern Bridal
designs.description: A fusion of contemporary design elements with traditional henna artistry. This modern bridal design features geometric patterns, floral motifs, and personalized elements that create a unique statement piece. Perfect for the contemporary bride who wants something different yet elegant. The design balances intricate details with clean, modern aesthetics.

designs.title: Engagement Elegance
designs.description: Beautiful engagement mehndi designs that celebrate your special moment with grace and sophistication. These designs are perfect for engagement ceremonies, featuring elegant patterns that complement traditional jewelry and attire. The designs are customizable to include initials, dates, or meaningful symbols that make your engagement even more special.
designs.colorDevelopment: Medium to deep brown after 20-30 hours

designs.title: Festival Quick
designs.description: Stunning mehndi designs perfect for festivals and quick celebrations. These designs are beautiful yet can be completed in 1-2 hours, making them ideal for busy schedules. Perfect for Karva Chauth, Eid, Diwali, and other festive occasions. The designs feature traditional motifs with modern execution for a fresh, celebratory look.
